eeye mehe awurudu uthsawaya,awurudu uthsawa ganne giya mase unata,eeye thama mehe uthsawaya gaththe,uthsawaya keruwe shri lanka sangamayen,krida pitiya hama wasarakama nagara sabhawen nomile laba denawa,hama kenama sangamayata bana bana hitiyata awurudu uthsawaya balanna enawa handawe 4 weddi pittaniya pirenna senaga,dan mama inna nagareth 1500 withara sinhala aya innawa, kattiya kohomath enne handawe wela thama mokada irida dawasa ne,ude mamath nikamata giya uthsawaya paththata,kridakayo kattiyayi,sanwidanaya karana kattiyayi,balanna aapu kattiya 100,150 withara thama hitiye, kammali kame idala tika welawakin aayeth gedara giya eeta passe ape kattiya ekka 4 pahu wela thama aaye balanna aawe,ethakota nam pittaniya pirenna senaga.ee weddi tharaga godak iwara wela.
